item.description:
...an approach to winter
embracing darkness as a path to awakening
you’re invited to join us for...
a half-day workshop addressing the essential presence of darkness in our lives. We’ll explore the ways we experience darkness through our senses and emotions.
As a group, we’ll apply techniques and tools that enable us to recognize and embrace our darkness on a conscious level with equanimity, and as a path toward cultivating increased awareness and acceptance in our lives.
As we cycle into winter, join us for a lively interactive practice that will include conscious eating, breathe work, moving meditation and spirit retrieval.

Saturday, December 4th, 2010
Workshop: 8:30–2
Contribution/Donation $25 Sadhana Meditation Center
100 Brickhill Ave. Suite C, South Portland, ME 04106 • www.sadhaname.com

Please call to register 207-772-6898
item.name: Embracing Darkness Workshop
